title: Arrested Development Season 4: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's David Haglund, June Thomas and Chris Wade discuss the fourth season of Arrested Development. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
